csvwrite

Write comma-separated value file.

Syntax

csvwrite(filename, M)
csvwrite(filename, M, r, c)

Input argument

filename

a string: filename destination.

M

an numeric or logical matrix.

r, c

integer: offset. default : 0, 0

Description

csvwrite writes an numeric matrix to an CSV format file.

Example

A = [Inf, -Inf, NaN, 3];
filename = [tempdir(), 'dlmwrite_example.csv'];
csvwrite(filename, A);
R = csvread(filename)
A = eye(3, 2);
csvwrite(filename, A);
R = fileread(filename)

See also

csvread, dlmread, fileread.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
